message:
MSBuild is going to be part of Visual Studio, NOT .NET Framework
http://blogs.msdn.com/b/visualstudio/archive/2013/07/24/msbuild-is-now-part-of-visual-studio.aspx
caption: Attachment UnavailableThis attachment may have been removed or the person who shared it may not have permission to share it with you.

data.message: It's a standalone package you can install separately. It's just bundled with Visual Studio instead of being bundled with (actually being part of) .NET framework.
